name: document_id
description: Unique key when combined with Good_through_date

name: borough
description: Borough that this document was recorded in.

name: doc_date
description: The date when the transaction described by this document actually occurred; recorded regularly 2003 onwards.

name: doc_amount
description: The recorded amount of the document.  Recorded for mortgages from 1982 onwards, and for deeds from 2003 onwards.

name: recorded_filed
description: The date when this document was recorded and filed; may be considerably later than Document_Date, but is more consistently recorded.

name: reel_year
description: Part of Reel ID system, for documents without CRFN.

name: reel_nbr
description: Part of Reel ID system, for documents without CRFN.

name: reel_pg
description: Part of Reel ID system, for documents without CRFN.

name: good_through_date
description: Unique key when combined with Document_id
